name: Video Wall Adds Safety, Awareness for CAL FIRE
description: A new Haivision Wall allows fire personnel to monitor new fires from headquarters and give units arriving to a scene better information about what they can expect. Previously, units would be going in blind. The wall also displays important perimeter and terrain maps to help field units.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office
